channel.title: Summertime. - Trey [EDM, sweet chords]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/trey-218274248/summertime
Here it is! My next track. I’ve really been liking working in this EDM area and I think my music is starting to improve a lot! I put a lot into the chords and melodies of this song, even though it surprising only took me 3 days to complete! Hopefully you enjoy, and plis folow :\. ![image|500x500](upload://t60t7RJ8pOdFrcnI1KWyhDm4jth.jpeg) If you have any feedback, please don’t hold back!

This is amazing

item.title: Summertime. - Trey [EDM, sweet chords]
item.dc:creator: Lakeview
item.description:
How long have you been creating? It sounds great! I’d also love he project file because there are some sounds in there I don’t reconize, and id love to see how you structure

item.title: Summertime. - Trey [EDM, sweet chords]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Thank you! I really focused hard to make a good structure and a flowing melody that felt natural. I do agree that I should have worked more on picking a better drum kit and making more variety there.

Read full topic

item.title: Summertime. - Trey [EDM, sweet chords]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Just caught this via Next Up…

Love it. Such a great feel and structure.

Really delivers. Deserves to break through.

 
(Only criticism would be that I’m not a fan of the drums sounds.)

Read full topic

item.title: Summertime. - Trey [EDM, sweet chords]
item.dc:creator: WAVZ
item.description:
I enjoyed it! I’m leaving for a flight to FL tomorrow so I’m in that summer mood… any way I could request the Auxy project file? I’m trying to learn EDM for this girl who sings, and Id like to dissect the song to see how certain effects are made. If not I understand sometimes I don’t let people access my works! But I’d appreciate it as it would give me something to do on my flight - WAVZ

Read full topic

https://soundcloud.com/trey-218274248/summertime

Here it is! My next track. I’ve really been liking working in this EDM area and I think my music is starting to improve a lot! I put a lot into the chords and melodies of this song, even though it surprising only took me 3 days to complete! Hopefully you enjoy, and plis folow :.


If you have any feedback, please don’t hold back!
